A default role must be selected: A default role must be selected
AIs compatible with the ChatGPT Local LL: Local LLMs compatible with OpenAI API are used here, e.g., ollama, API address usually ends with /v1
AIs compatible with the ChatGPT also use: No need to fill in for official OpenAI API
OpenAI and compatible AIs for LLM re-segmentation
Access translation and dubbing channel c: Access translation and dubbing channel configuration
Has been connected to the text model tra: Has been connected to the text model translation subtitles and speech recognition and openai/doubao/Azure/Minimaxi/Dubbingx dubbing characters
Add background audio for output video: Add background audio for the output video
After cleaning, you need to restart the: Restart required after cleaning. Only cache/temp files are cleared. For config, delete .json files in the videotrans folder.
Are you sure you want to restart the app: Are you sure you want to restart?
Automatic shutdown after completing all: Shutdown after all tasks are done
Batch audio or video translation with al: Batch audio/video translation with customizable options.
Batch merge video and audio one-to-one: Batch merge videos and audios one-to-one
Batch merge video and srt subtitles one: Batch merge videos and SRTs one-to-one
Batch recognize speech in audio or video: Batch recognize speech to SRT subtitles
Batch recognize speech in video as srt s: Batch recognize speech to subtitles, with optional translation
Byte VolcEngine TTS only supports Chines: VolcEngine TTS only supports zh, en, ja, pt, es, th, vi, id.
ChatTTS only supports Chinese, English: ChatTTS only supports Chinese and English.
Check to set the voice role separately a: Check to set voice role separately below.
Choose at least one for audio and video: Choose at least one audio or video
Cleaning up files that have been process: Cleaning up processed files from previous runs.
Click for detailed description: Click for details on audio splitting.
Click on Set Home Directory to save the: Set Home Directory to save result files.
Click to end all tasks immediately and r: Click to end all tasks and restart.
Click to open help page: Click to open help for this parameter.
Click to set detailed recognition parame: Set detailed recognition params for faster-whisper.
Click to set up and modify the glossary: Click to set up and modify glossary.
Click to start the next step immediately: Click to start the next step immediately.
Click to view the detailed error report: Click to view detailed error report.
Click to view the tutorial for filling i: Click for network proxy setup tutorial.
Combine 2 subtitle files into one to for: Combine 2 subtitle files into one bilingual subtitle.
CosyVoice only supports Chinese, English: CosyVoice only supports zh, en, ja, ko dubbing.
Currently Faster-Whisper-XXL cannot be u: Faster-Whisper-XXL is not available in the packaged version. Please deploy from source or use it separately.
Customize each configuration to batch vi: Customize settings for batch video translation. For single videos, you can pause to edit subtitles.
Do not include files with the same name: Files with same name but different extensions are not allowed, please modify {}.
ElevenLabs: Cloning in the selected targ: ElevenLabs: Cloning is not supported for the selected target language.
ElevenLabs: Cloning of the selected pron: ElevenLabs: Cloning is not supported for the selected source language.
Error in embedding the final step of the: Error embedding subtitle dubbing in final step.
Failed to access Google services. Please: Failed to access Google/ChatGPT. Please set up your proxy (VPN).
Failed to parse {} information, please c: Failed to parse info from {}. Please check if it plays correctly.
Failed to separate audio, please check t: Failed to separate audio. Check log or retry.
Fill in a natural language text (must be: Describe your domain in English as a prompt for the Qwen-MT model.
Fill in all available models, separated: Enter all available models, comma-separated, to select them above.
Fill in the HTTP address after the: Enter the HTTP address after starting the parakeet-api project.
Fill in the HTTP address after the ChatT: Enter the HTTP address after starting the ChatTTS webUI.
Fill in the HTTP address after the clone: Enter the HTTP address after starting the clone-voice project.
Fill in the HTTP address after the kokor: Enter address after kokoro-uiapi starts, default is http://127.0.0.1:5066.
Fill in the HTTP address for your OTT pr: Enter the HTTP address of your deployed OTT project here.
Fill in the available voice acting role: Enter available voice role names, comma-separated.
Fill in the extra parameters passed to t: Fill extra parameters passed to API via 'extra' key; null passes 'pyvideotrans'.
Fill in the full address starting with h: Enter the full address starting with http.
Fill in the http starting webui address: Enter the webUI address starting with http.
From base to large v3, the effect is get:
tiny to large-v3: better quality, more resources needed.
<12G GPU: avoid large models with CUDA.
.en models are for English only.
GPT-SoVITS only supports Chinese, Englis: GPT-SoVITS only supports zh, en, ja, ko dubbing.
Google Cloud TTS only supports Chinese,: Google Cloud TTS supports: zh, en, ja, ko, fr, de, es, it, pt, ru, hi, ar, tr, th, vi, id.
If checked, the synthesized audio is sav: If checked, save synthesized audio to SRT's original folder.
If selected, F5-TTS will re-use Whisper-: If selected, F5-TTS re-uses Whisper-v3 for reference audio (slower).
If selected, separate human voice and ba: If selected, separate vocals and background sound,
If selected, separate vocals/background, and embed background sound in final video.
If selected, the subtitles will be saved: If checked, save subtitles to original location with the same name.
If using the official Claude interface,: Leave empty for official Claude API; fill in third-party API here.
If using the official OpenAI interface,: Leave empty for official OpenAI API; fill in third-party API here.
Input your deeplx api url: Enter your deployed DeepLx address here.
Input your deeplx key: Enter your key; leave empty if none.
Input your libretranslate key: Enter your key; leave empty if none.
Kokoro TTS only supports Chinese, Englis: Kokoro TTS only supports zh, en, ja, pt, es, it, hi, fr.
Local LLM API url: LLM API URL, /v1 is not auto-added, add it manually if needed.
May not work in different players: Outline color, may not work in some players.
Merge audio, video, and subtitles into o: Merge audio, video, and subtitles into one file.
Mix two audio files into one audio file: Mix two audio files into one.
Models ending in .en may not be used for: .en models cannot be used for auto detection.
Modify the translation result and save i: When translating a single file, modify and save results here.
Multiple MP4 videos can be selected and: Select multiple MP4 videos for automatic processing.
Multiple files can be selected by defaul: Select multiple files by default; check to select folders.
Must be a paid account, free account fre: Paid account required; free account has usage limits.
Must import srt file or fill in text box: Must import SRT file or enter text.
Must pass in the reference audio file pa: Reference audio file path is required.
Must select video and watermark image: Must select video and watermark image.
Negative deceleration, positive accelera: Negative for slower, positive for faster.
No need to fill in the official interfac: Leave empty for official API; fill in third-party DeepL API here.
No reference audio exists and cannot use: No reference audio, cannot use clone function.
No result, no need to save: No result, no need to save.
No speech was detected, please make sure: No speech detected. Ensure audio/video contains speech in the selected language.
No valid audio address or base64 audio d: No valid audio address or base64 data returned.
Number of characters per line for subtit: Characters per line for other languages
Only works when hard subtitles are embed: Only effective when embedding hard subtitles.
Open Documents: How to use? Click for documents.
OpenAI Speech to Text API: OpenAI Speech to Text & Compatible API
Overall acceleration or deceleration of: Adjust overall dubbing speed: positive to speed up, negative to slow down.
Overall recognition is suitable for vide: Overall recognition is suitable for videos with or without background music and noticeable silence.
Parakeet-tdt models only support Englis: Parakeet-tdt models only support English & Japanese.
Please import an SRT subtitle file first: Please import an SRT file first.
Please input AccessKey ID and AccessKey: AccessKey ID and AccessKey Secret are required.
Please input appid and Secret: AppID and Secret Key are required.
Please make sure that the audio file {}: Please ensure audio file {} exists in the chatterbox folder.
Please make sure the selected TTS type m: Ensure the selected TTS type matches its URL.
Please select a valid role from the drop: Please select a valid role from the list.
Please select the target language first: Please select the target language first.
Preset role {} is incorrectly configured: Preset role {} is misconfigured, missing clone reference audio.
Recognition language is only supported i: Language detection is only supported in faster-whisper/openai-whisper/Gemini modes.
Recognition may take a while, please be: Recognition may take a while, please be patient.
Reference audio needs to be in wav forma: Reference audio: WAV format, <10s, clear, no background noise, stored in /f5-tts directory.
Select the TTS service to use, support t: Select TTS service, supports official webUI of {}.
Select the folder where the video and su: Select folder with same-named video and subtitles.
Select the folder where you want to merg: Select folder with video/audio to merge.
Select to perform noise reduction proces: Select for noise reduction from modelscope.cn (time-consuming).
Select where to save the processed outpu: Select output destination for processed files.
SenseVoiceSmall models only support Chin: FunASR SenseVoiceSmall model only supports zh, en, ja, ko.
Separate audio and silent videos from vi: Separate video into audio and silent MP4.
Separating vocals and background music,: Separating vocals and background music, may take time.
Starting from version 3.68 of this softw: Since v3.68, only official webUI (F5-TTS/Spart-TTS/index-TTS/Dia-TTS/VoxCPM) is supported. Third-party packages and APIs are deprecated.
Starting to process speech noise reducti: Starting noise reduction, this may take a while.
Subtitle File 1 and Subtitle File 2 must: Subtitle File 1 and 2 must be selected.
Subtitle file 1:The final length of the: Subtitle file 1: Final length is based on this file.
Subtitle format is not correct, please r: Incorrect subtitle format. Please re-import or delete.
Subtitle multi-role dubbing: assign a vo: Multi-role dubbing: assign a voice to each subtitle.
Target language must be selected to embe: Target language must be selected to embed subtitles.
Thank all donators, Click to view the li: Thanks to all donators. Your help improves this project.
The [{}] not exists, download model to m: [{}] not found, will be downloaded to models folder.
The current directory {} is not writabl: Current directory {} is not writable. Please move to a non-system folder or run as administrator.
The detection function cannot be used wh: Detection is disabled when subtitles are imported.
The model needs to be downloaded from mo: Model will be downloaded from modelscope.cn if not found, please wait.
The network proxy address you fill in se: Proxy address seems incorrect. Format is http://127.0.0.1:port. Enter API addresses in Settings. If sure, click Yes to continue.
The number of seconds to pause and wait: Pause (seconds) after each request to prevent rate limiting.
The original file {} does not contain an: Original file {} has no audio/video data. Please check if it's playable.
The original sound clone cannot be audit: Original voice clone cannot be auditioned.
The original text to be replaced must be: The original text to be replaced is required.
The preset role {} was not found in the: Preset role {} not found in configuration.
The qwen-tts model only supports Chinese: qwen-tts supports Chinese/English; qwen3-tts supports 10 languages.
The reference audio path name and the te: Reference audio path and its text must be set.
The returned subtitles have no timestamp: Returned subtitles have no timestamp and cannot be used.
The target language code is not set corr: Target language code is incorrect, cannot translate.
The video file {} does not contain valid: Video file {} contains no valid video data.
The voice is not support listen: This role does not support audition.
There are {} sets of videos with the sam: There are {} sets of same-named videos and audios to merge.
There are {} sets of same-named videos and SRTs to merge.
There is no valid audio in the file {} a: File {} has no valid audio. Please play it manually to confirm sound.
Unchecked means there is an outline stro: Unchecked: outline shadow, no background block. Checked: vice versa.
Video and audio of the same name do not: Same-named video and audio not found, cannot merge.
Video and srt of the same name do not ex: Same-named video and SRT not found, cannot merge.
Video needs transcoded and take a long t: Video needs transcoding, may take a long time...
Videos to be separated: Select video(s) to separate audio from
View details error: Click to view detailed error info
When selecting the faster/openai-whisper: When using faster/openai-whisper, LLM will be used for re-segmentation; falls back to original if it fails.
When using faster/openai-whisper, a local algorithm will re-segment. May be ineffective without punctuation.
When this item is checked, and the targe: If checked and target/source languages differ, move translated SRT to video location and rename it.
When using AI translation channel, you: When using AI translation, you can send the full SRT file for better results.
When using AI translation channel, you c: When using AI translation, you can send the full SRT file for better results.
When using Index-TTS, select v1 or v2.
Whether to loop the background music whe: Loop background music if duration is insufficient?
Will merge video and audio with the same: Will merge same-named video and audio in the folder (e.g., 1.mp4 and 1.wav).
Will merge video and srt subtitles with: Will merge same-named video and SRT in the folder (e.g., 1.mp4 and 1.srt).
You are a top-notch subtitle translation: You are a top-notch subtitle translation engine.
You can scan the QR code or click the ab: Scan the QR code or click the button above to donate.
You must deploy and start the clone-voic: You must deploy and start the clone-voice service and set its address in Settings.
You must select the folder where the vid: You must select the folder containing same-named video and audio.
You must select the folder containing same-named video and SRT subtitles.
You need to install and start https://gi: You need to install and start chatterbox-api to use it.
and finally output video will embed back: and finally embed background sound in output video
back_audio_place: Full path of BGM, delete to remove
bixutianxiecloneapi: To use clone-voice TTS, deploy it and set the API address in Settings->Clone-Voice API.
bixuyinshipin: Must select a valid audio/video file.
cudatips: Enable if you have an NVIDIA GPU with CUDA for a significant speed boost.
deepl_authkey: You must enter your DeepL auth key in Settings.
deepl_nosupport: This translation channel doesn't support the target language.
distil-* only use when faster-whisper: `distil-*` models are for faster-whisper local mode only.
endtiquzimu: Recognition finished, waiting for next step
endtrans: Translation finished, waiting for next step
enmodelerror: Use distil or .en models only for English audio.
faster-whisper-xxl.exe is only available: faster-whisper-xxl.exe is only available on Windows.
fenge_tips:
Overall: Model segments the whole audio. Avoid for large videos to prevent OOM errors.
Equal: Split into fixed-second segments.
import src error: Import error. Check if the file contains valid SRT format.
jimiaohoufanyi: This window will automatically close after the countdown ends. If you need to modify the subtitles, please click 'Stop Countdown' and then modify it.
juanzhu: Help this software survive and stay updated!
llmduanju: For LLM re-segmentation, set OpenAI API in Settings. Can switch to DeepSeek in advanced options.
llmduanjudp: For LLM re-segmentation, set DeepSeek API in Settings. Can switch from DeepSeek in advanced options.
meitiaozimugeshi:
Subtitle format:

Number
HH:MM:SS,ms --> HH:MM:SS,ms
Subtitle text

Example:

1
00:01:10,000 --> 00:01:20,150
This is the subtitle text.
model_type_tips:
faster: faster, less resources, needs CUDA+cuDNN+cuBLAS for acceleration.
openai: slower, more resources, needs only CUDA for acceleration.
GoogleSpeech: uses Google, needs proxy, slightly worse results.
must select audio or video file: Must select audio or video file.
newversion: New version available. Click to download.
nocuda: Your device doesn't meet CUDA requirements. Ensure you have an NVIDIA GPU with CUDA configured. See Help->CUDA help.
nocudnn: cuDNN is not installed. Please follow the guide to install it and restart, or switch to the openai model.
onlyvideo_tips: If checked, only the final video will be saved, without subtitles or other assets.
paraformer-zh models only support Chine: FunASR paraformer-zh models only support Chinese.
please input your Qwen TTS API KEY: Please input your Qwen TTS API KEY in TTS Settings.
proxy address: Google/ChatGPT is blocked in some regions. A proxy is required. This is not the API address.
recogn result is empty: No subtitles recognized. Check for human speech in the selected language.
shuoming01:
Click to audition the current voice role.
Dubbing generation may take a few seconds.
shuoming02: Hardsubs are always visible. Softsubs can be toggled in supported players. Choose hardsubs for web playback.
shuoming03: Dubbing duration may differ from original, causing sync issues. Adjusting speed or padding may help. See tutorials for more.
subtitle_tips: Edit subtitles here, or drag and drop an SRT file.
tencent_key: You must enter Tencent SecretId and SecretKey in Settings.
tiquzimu: Set source language to video's language, and target language to the desired translation.
tuodongfanyi: Please import the SRT file to be translated.
tuodonghuoshuru: Enter text or drag and drop an SRT file here.
waitrole: Getting available roles, please wait and re-select.
wufapeiyin: No target language selected. Cannot dub. Please select a target language or cancel dubbing role.
xuanzeyinshipin: Click to select or drag and drop audio/video file(s) here.
yuyanjuesebixuan: Language and role must be selected.
zidonghebingmiaohou: Modify subtitles to be dubbed and assign voice roles
zimubianjitishi: You can edit subtitles for better accuracy.
{lang} represents the target language na: {lang} represents the target language name, do not delete it.
From tiny model to base to small to medi: From tiny to large-v3, recognition improves but requires more resources and is slower. Default is tiny. For better results, use larger models. `.en` and `distil-*` models are for English only.
Please upload reference audio in wav for: Please upload reference audio in wav format
Please ensure that the reference audio d: Please ensure that the reference audio duration is less than 10 seconds
Each line must be split into two parts w: Each line must be split into two parts with #, in the format of audio name.wav#audio text content
Please save the audio file in the {}/f5-: Please save the audio file in the {}/f5-tts directory
Each line must be separated into three p: Each line must be separated into three parts by the English # sign, in the format of audio name.wav#audio text content#audio language code
Please fill in one line at a time, follo: Please fill in one line at a time, following the term on the left and the translation on the right, e.g. ,Ballistic Missile Defense=BMD
Speech recognition model (must start wit: Speech recognition model (must start with qwen3-asr)
Subtitle translation model (must start w: Subtitle translation model (must start with qwen-mt or other qwen text generation model)
Configure Alibaba Bailian Qwen-MT model: Configure Alibaba Bailian's Qwen-MT model or other text models or Qwen3-ASR speech recognition model here
Fill in all inference access points, and: Fill in all inference access points, and you can select them above
Prompt: Please open the {} file directly:
To modify subtitle translation prompts, open the [Software Directory/videotrans/prompts] folder.

[Software Directory/videotrans/prompts/srt/] stores prompts when Send SRT Subtitles is selected.
[Software Directory/videotrans/prompts/text/] stores prompts when Send SRT Subtitles is unchecked.
The prompt word file used by the current channel is: [{}.txt]
Place the reference audio in the chatter: Place the reference audio in the chatterbox folder under the root directory of the software, and fill in the reference audio name with the suffix, for example 123.mp3
Reference audio does not exist: {} Pleas: Reference audio does not exist: {} Please make sure the audio exists
elevenlabs toggle role: If the dubbing channel currently selected in the interface is Elevenlabs.io, you need to switch to another channel first, and then switch back to see the new role
Please also check whether CUDA12.8 and c: Please also check whether CUDA12.8 and cudnn9 are installed correctly.
The current language does not support au: The current language does not support audition
Are you sure the cleanup has been output: Are you sure the cleanup has been output?
If you confirm to clean up, all files in: If you confirm to clean up, all files in the output directory [{}] will be deleted. please make sure there are no important files in the directory and back it up in advance to avoid data loss.
The output directory is not allowed to p: The output directory is not allowed to point to the input directory. Please use the default or create an empty folder as the output
Must be selected, otherwise it cannot be: Must be selected, otherwise it cannot be used
The model does not exist. Please downloa: The model does not exist. Please download the model to the {} directory first.
Please turn off the clear proxy and try: Please turn off the clear proxy and try again
promptSelectVideoAndSubtitle: Please select a video and its subtitle file.
promptSelectAtLeastOneSubtitle: Please select at least one subtitle line.
errorNoAudioTrackForAudioOnly: This video has no audio track. Cannot proceed with the [Audio only] option.
Click here to stop the countdown: Click here to stop the countdown
If you need to delete a line of subtitle: Edit subtitles here. To delete a line, simply clear its text.
This window will automatically close aft: This window will auto-close when the countdown ends. To edit subtitles or assign speakers, please 'Stop the countdown' first.
Speaker: Speaker
If the selected channel supports speaker: If the selected channel supports speaker recognition, selecting this option will insert a speaker identifier at the beginning of the subtitles.
